title: Linked Cases
p1: Tell us if there are any existing cases this claim could be linked to.
li1: a case or cases you have already brought to the tribunal
li2: a case or cases brought by other people against the same employer with the same or similar circumstances
p3: This will help the tribunal consider whether the cases should be linked in any way.
legend: Are there are any existing cases which may be linked to this new claim? (Optional)
linkedCasesTextLabel: Enter the case numbers and names of the people in the existing case or cases. (Optional)
